Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive onboarding system with Google Sheets integration

Major Features:
- Created full onboarding form with 29 fields for new business clients
- Integrated Google Sheets API for automatic data submission
- Added video showcase with dashboard screenshot thumbnail
- Made 3D Spline background non-draggable while preserving cursor interaction
- Added Onboarding link to navigation bar

Technical Changes:
- Added googleapis package for Google Sheets integration
- Created Onboarding.tsx page with form validation and conditional fields
- Updated server.js with /api/submit-onboarding endpoint
- Fixed Google Sheets column mapping (29 columns A-AC)
- Added ONBOARDING_SETUP.md and GOOGLE_SHEET_STRUCTURE.md documentation
- Modified Hero.tsx to prevent 3D background dragging
- Updated FeaturedDashboard.tsx to use video with poster image
- Added route for /onboarding in App.tsx

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed column alignment issues in Google Sheets data submission
- Added missing current_phone_provider and existing_business_number fields
- Corrected rowData array to match exact sheet structure

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
